misdeed: Several children and farmers have gone missing near the local brook, with only wet footprints and hoof prints leading to the water.
solution: The Vaesen is a brook horse. It can be defeated by luring it out of the water and trapping it with iron shackles.

clues.description: A farmer saw a magnificent horse near the brook, but it disappeared as he approached.
Local children talk about a beautiful horse that invites them to ride it.
Strange, horse-like neighing is heard at night near the brook.
Footprints and hoof prints are found leading into the water but not out of it.
A fisherman found strands of white hair caught in his net.
A villager mentions a local legend about a horse that drowns those who try to ride it.

plotTwist.description: An old hermit by the brook knows how to trap the brook horse but demands a high price for the information.
